message: I recently traded in my Motorola Droid when I bought the iPhone 4 on Verizon. By including all the boxes, cables, etc., and by choosing an Amazon Gift Card (instead of cash), and by using the TWiT code, I earned $116. Considering I paid $150 for the phone in July, that's pretty good. In a way it's like getting the iPhone for $84
I've submitted two old Blackberry 8320's and an iPod Touch.  The experience has been first class.
